abstract: Subway is introducing “4 to 9ers,” a comedy series appearing on hulu.com. The show centers on young employees of the restaurant, who work there from 4 to 9 p.m. after they finish high school for the day.
snippet: Subway is introducing “4 to 9ers,” a comedy series appearing on hulu.com. The show centers on young employees of the restaurant, who work there from 4 to 9 p.m. after they finish high school for the day.
lead_paragraph: A fast-food chain known for its ardent embrace of branded entertainment, embedding its products and restaurants in episodes of television series, is commissioning a series of its own, to be watched on a Web site where consumers watch TV shows.

headline.main: This Subway Series Is About Commerce, Not Baseball
